post.summary: Create a normal user and return user details and jwt token

200.description: The registration request was succesfull and a verification email has been sent to the specified email address

message.example: Registration successfull, please check your email for verification instructions

post.summary: verify a new account with a verification token received via email after registration

400.description: Verification failed due to an invalid token

post.summary: Authenticate account credentials and return a jwt token and user details

200.description: Account created successfully, verification is not required for accounts created with this endpoint. The details of the new account are returned.

get.summary: Get a list of all accounts
Get a single account by id
get.description: Admin users can access any account, regular users are restricted to their own account

patch.description: Admin users can update any account, regular users are restricted to their own account and soon they wont be able to update role

200.description: Account updated successfully. The details of the updated user are returned

delete.description: Admin users can delete any account, regular users are restricted to their own account.

get.summary: Get a list of all subscriptions
Get a single subscriptionType by id

patch.description: Admin users can update any subscriptionType

200.description: subscriptionType updated successfully. The details of the subscriptionType are returned

delete.description: Admin users can delete any subscriptionType, regular users are restricted.

get.summary: Get a list of all jobStatuses
Get a single jobStatus by id

patch.description: Admin users can update any jobStatus

200.description: jobStatus updated successfully. The details of the jobStatus are returned

delete.description: Admin users can delete any jobStatus, regular users are restricted.

get.summary: Get a list of all industries types

post.description: Admin users can create a new industry

get.summary: Get a single industry by id

patch.description: Admin users can update any industry

200.description: industry updated successfully. The details of the industry are returned

delete.description: Admin users can delete any industry, regular users are restricted. Just be careful deleting an industry will cascade jobs under it

get.summary: Get a list of all skill types

post.description: Admin users can create a new skill

get.summary: Get a single skill by id

patch.description: Admin users can update any skill

200.description: skill updated successfully. The details of the skill are returned

delete.description: Admin users can delete any skill, regular users are restricted. Future implementation is making sure we dont cascade dependent tables when a skill is removed

post.description: Admin users can create a new proposalStatus

patch.description: Admin users can update any proposalStatus

delete.description: Admin users can delete any proposalStatus, regular users are restricted. Future implementation is making sure we dont cascade dependent tables when a proposalStatus is removed

get.summary: Get a list of all freelancers
get.description: Open to all users, update will have pagination and query params

post.description: users can create a freelancer profile. Technically you will not require to use this endpoint , since a relation will be created on user signup

200.description: freelancer profile was correctly inserted if lat and long were not provided, they default to greenwich coordinates of (0,0)

get.summary: Get a freelancer  by id

patch.description: Freelancers can update their own profiles

200.description: freelancer updated successfully. The details of the freelancer are returned

delete.description: Admin users can delete any freelancer, regular users are restricted. Future implementation is making sure we cascade user tables and any other data

get.summary: Get a list of all hiringManager
get.description: Open to all users, update will have pagination and query params

post.description: users can create a hiringManager profile. Technically you will not require to use this endpoint, just as freelancer will not use theirs , since a relation will be created on user signup

200.description: hiringManager profile was correctly inserted if lat and long were not provided, they default to greenwich coordinates of (0,0)

get.summary: Get a hiringManager  by id

patch.description: hiringManager can update their own profiles, and admin can update any profile

200.description: hiringManager updated successfully. The details of the hiringManager are returned

delete.description: Admin users can delete any hiringManager, regular users are restricted. Future implementation is making sure we cascade user tables and any other data

get.summary: Get a list of all freelancerSubscription
get.description: Restricted to admin users, update will have pagination and query params

200.description: An array of all freelancerSubscription, update will have join with user table

post.summary: Create a freelancer freelancerSubscription, restricted to admins
post.description: Technically you will not be required to use this endpoint, only edge cases like the db failing to create an initial subscription; then will you actually need it

200.description: freelancer freelancerSubscription was correctly inserted and expiry_date set

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: freelancer id, since a freelancer has only one subscription

get.summary: Get a freelancerSubscription by id
get.description: Restricted to admins and subscription owner i,e the freelancer

patch.description: Another edge case where manual updating of subscription can be done, if something goes wrong in the backend side

delete.description: Admin users can delete any freelancers subscription.Beats me why we need it now

FreelancerSubscriptionResponse.description: freelancer freelancerSubscription was correctly inserted and expiry_date set

UnauthorizedError.description: Access token is missing or invalid, or the user does not have access to perform the action
